column2: "What kind of greeting do you call that, Patty?"
"Today, we're going to tell you all about Photons and the amazing things you can do with them!"
"Sorry about this. She overhead someone talking about this the other day, so now she wants to pass it on."
"Turns out, Photons are everywhere! They're all around us in the air, and even in our own bodies!"
"Bam! Oh no, I took a hit! Pow! But I'm okay, thanks to my Photons!"
"As a Hunter, my body is full to the brim with Photons, so I can shrug off smaller hits like they're nothing!"
"Forces use Photons in the air around them to blow everything up!"
"Rangers condense Photons into bullets and alter their properties to target enemy weak points."
"Oh that's right! Rangers really are amazing!"
"...hm. But I wonder which Class is the best?"
"...And now you're on a completely different subject. Come on, Patty, that's enough out of you."
"Sorry about her. She'll go on all day if you let her."
"Hey, wait! I'm not done talking yet!"
